document.full_text: hundreds of palestinians marched in a symbolic funeral procession on monday in memory of a pro-palestinian italian activist killed by al qaeda sympathizers in the hamas-ruled gaza strip.
document.title: hundreds in gaza honor slain italian activist
lines_and_colors: hundreds of palestinians marched in a symbolic funeral procession on monday in memory of a pro-palestinian italian activist killed by al qaeda sympathizers in the hamas-ruled gaza strip.
